subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Jeurys Familia gave up a homer to Alex Gordon in the ninth to tie the score, and Alcides Escobar scored on a sacrifice fly as the Royals won the longest Game 1 in Series history.
snippet: Jeurys Familia gave up a homer to Alex Gordon in the ninth to tie the score, and Alcides Escobar scored on a sacrifice fly as the Royals won the longest Game 1 in Series history.
